reasoning_log: The matching process relied heavily on unique architectural features and specific furniture arrangements. Desc_1 and Desc_2 were matched to Image_1 and Image_2, respectively, as Image_2 provides the wider context of the open kitchen/living area shown separately in Image_1. Desc_3 was uniquely identified by its 'directly临街' (facing the street) and '狹長' (narrow/long) characteristics visible in Image_3. Desc_4 was confirmed by the presence of both kitchen cabinets and a wooden staircase (Image_4). The two master bedroom descriptions (Desc_5 and Desc_6) were assigned to the two different views of the same room (Image_5 highlighting storage, Image_6 highlighting the window/space). The four bathroom descriptions (Desc_8 to Desc_11) were differentiated by key structural elements: Image_8 (the only one with a window), Image_9 (the irregular, sloped ceiling indicating under-stair placement), Image_10 (the distinct white marble-look tiles), and Image_11 (the visibly narrow/long layout). All 11 descriptions were matched 1:1 to the 11 images.

matching_result_list.evidence: Clear view of the furnished living room with a finished marble TV wall and large window, matching '客廳' and '電視主牆完成'.
Shows the open transition between the living area (left) and the L-shaped white kitchen (right), confirming '客餐廳＋開放式廚房' and '開放格局'.
Empty, narrow ground floor space with a large opening directly leading to the street/outside, matching '一樓前場' and '直接臨街'.
Features the kitchen area (cabinets/sink) immediately adjacent to a wooden staircase, confirming '廚房＋樓梯旁過道' and '樓梯位置明確'.

tag_list: 樓梯與衛浴集中於同區)

matching_result_list.evidence: Master bedroom view showing the large sliding wardrobe and built-in shelving/dressing table, emphasizing '收納充足' and '家具齊全'.

matching_result_list.evidence: Alternate view of the master bedroom, focusing on the large window and floor space, matching '主臥房另一視角' and '空間餘裕'.

tag_list: 適合作為長期居住主臥

matching_result_list.evidence: Secondary bedroom featuring a low platform bed ('低台設計') and an integrated desk/work area ('書桌工作區').
The only bathroom image that clearly shows a window, matching '衛浴一(有窗)' and '採光通風佳'.

matching_result_list.evidence: Irregular space with a sloped ceiling and mirror, characteristic of a bathroom located under a staircase ('樓梯下空間').
Features distinct white marble-look wall tiles, matching '衛浴三(白色牆磚)'.
Visibly narrow and long layout with fixtures aligned along one wall, matching '衛浴四(狹長型)' and '狹長格局'.
